name: The Duel (GGenp)
description:
Project 1 for Experimental Game Design, Spring 2023.

Created by: G Li.

How to Play:

  • During the first 5 seconds, you can see your opponent's 3 attacks in the future.
  • During the next 5 seconds, the attacks you saw before actually come, and you must parry these attacks.
  • Click and drag to draw your own slash to parry.
  • Successfully parry all 3 attacks to win the duel, failing to parry any attack leads to death.

Known Bugs/Issues:

  • Sometimes the sprites for the actual attacks for the last 5 seconds cannot be seen if successfully parried too quickly.
  • Sometimes the sound effects of actual attacks for the last 5 seconds and successful parries do not play.
  • Sometimes one successful parry can parry multiple attacks, even before the rest of attacks are launched.
